description: Exponential convolution of Fibonacci numbers with themselves (divided by 2).
formula: G.f.: x^2/(1-2*x-4*x^2)/(1-x). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Mar 05 2003E.g.f.: exp(x)*(cosh(sqrt(5)*x)-1)/5. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 01 2004a(n+1)=sum(i=0, n, F(i)*2^(i-1)); a(n)=(1/5)*(2^(n-1)*L(n)-1) where L(n) are Lucas numbers defined in A000032. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Sep 25 2004a(n)=2*a(n-1)+4*a(n-2)+1, a(0)=0 ;a(1)=0 . [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Dec 14 2008]G.f.: G(0)*x^2/(2*(1-x)^2), where G(k)= 1 + 1/(1 - x*(5*k-1)/(x*(5*k+4) - 1/G(k+1))); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, May 26 2013
maple: a[0]:=0:a[1]:=0:for n from 2 to 50 do a[n]:=2*a[n-1]+4*a[n-2]+1 od: seq(a[n], n=0..29);# [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Dec 14 2008]
crossrefs: Cf. (partial sums of) A063727, A081057, A014334.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
